name: src/index.js
src/tile.js
Tile
description: A tile object containing tile ID, tileset ID and custom properties.

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the tile. Can also be tile data you loaded from JSON or a plain string in the following format: <tileId:tilesetId>

name: tileId
description: The tile ID of the tile.

name: tilesetId
description: The tileset ID of the tile.

name: setData
description: Sets the data for this tile.

params.name: tileId
params.description: The ID to assign to the tile.

params.name: tilesetId
params.description: The tileset ID to assign to the tile.

params.name: replaceEmpty
params.description: Should values less than 0 (-1) be handled (true) or ignored (false).

name: toJSON
description: toJSON function used for JSON serialization.

name: clone
description: Creates a clone out of this tile.

name: src/tilearea.js
TileArea
description: A tile area object with a size and tiles.

name: width
description: The width of the tile area.

name: height
description: The height of the tile area.

name: tiles
description: The tiles in the tile area

name: getTileIndex
description: Gets the index of a tile in the tile array from a position.

unknown.tagValue: {number} The index of the tile in the main array.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate of the tile.

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate of the tile.

return.description: The index of the tile in the main array.

unknown.tagValue: {TileArea} A {@link TileArea} of the area requested.

params.name: x
params.description: The x coordinate of the tile area.

params.name: y
params.description: The y coordinate of the tile area.

params.name: width
params.description: The width of the tile area.

params.name: height
params.description: The height of the tile area.

return.description: A {@link TileArea} of the area requested.

name: insertTileArea
description:
Inserts a TileArea into this TileArea.

This isertion does not fail if it goes outside of the TileArea.

params.name: x
params.description: Top left x coordinate of where the TileArea should be inserted.

params.name: y
params.description: Top left y coordinate of where the TileArea should be inserted.

params.name: skipEmpty
params.description: If the insertion should skip empty (-1) tiles.

name: src/tilelayer.js
TileLayer
description: A tile layer object containing tiles and other properties.

params.name: parentMap
params.description: The parent map for this layer.

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the layer. Can also be layer data you loaded from JSON or similar.

name: name
description: The name of the tile layer.

name: src/tilemap.js
TileMap
description: A tilemap object with name, sizes and layers.

params.name: options
params.description: Options for the tilemap. Can also be a tilemap you loaded from JSON or similar.

params.name: options.layers
params.description: Same structure as options in {@link TileLayer#constructor}

params.name: options.tilesets
params.description: Same structure as options in {@link TileSet#constructor}

name: tileWidth
description: The width of a tile for the tilemap.

name: tileHeight
description: The height of a tile for the tilemap.

name: tilesets
description: The tilesets the tilemap consists of.

name: createLayer
description: Creates a new layer and adds it to the tilemap.

name: addTileset
description: Adds a tileset to the tilemap.

params.name: tileset
params.description: the tileset to add to the map.

name: getJSON
description: Converts this tilemap to a JSON string.

unknown.tagValue: {string} - The JSON serialization of this tilemap.

return.description: The JSON serialization of this tilemap.

name: src/tileset.js
TileSet
description: A tileset object for storing arbitrary information about tilesets.

name: type
description:
The type of the tileset.
Possible values are: "test", "image"

name: path
description:
The path of the tileset.
This should only be used if tileset type is set to "image".

name: test/tile.js
it6
description: can replace both tile ID and tileset ID

name: it8
description: does replace empty if told so

name: it13
description: clones all the properties of a tile

name: test/tilearea.js
it27
description: doesn't crash when going out of bounds

name: test/tilemap.js
test/tileset.js
